Hotel Guests Reviews Guests reviews Very Good See all reviews X Wait for reviews ... JOHN United States 10/20/2007 Overall hotel rate: Good Friendly staff. Problem with the door we reported on the day of the arrival and was still not fixed when we left two days later. Dinning room too small. Ib Bo Denmark 9/20/2007 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Very good room - although old it was comfortable and with charm. All personnel made the stay a nice experience. The breakfast facilities too small for the number of people staying. We followed the advise to get to the breakfast early - however it seemed that the room was packed throughout the period between 7 and 10 a.m. Dickson Canada 7/27/2007 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Convenient location for the price. Outstanding friendly staff service. Great breakfast. No air condition. Location is good but on a quiet street behind a busy street. Bed not very supportive. Dickson Canada 7/27/2007 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Convenient location for the price. Outstanding friendly staff service. Great breakfast. No air condition. Location is good but on a quiet street behind a busy street. Bed not very supportive. Kim Meng Malaysia 5/25/2007 Overall hotel rate: Good Service at the hotel was fridnly and helpful. We had a taxi waiting for us at the appointed time early in the morning with just a request the evening before. Rooms were clean and presentable. The location was off the main street and was not so ideal Art & Sheila United States 5/23/2007 Overall hotel rate: Excellent We were very pleased with this hotel. Our room was very comfortable and quiet. We were happy with the location and the fact that the hotel was very reasonable priced. Also--most of your staff in the reception was very helpful and pleasant. We were very pleased with our stay. Carlos Puerto Rico 10/16/2006 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Well located, friendly personnel, excellent value for money. Elena United States 10/16/2006 Overall hotel rate: Good Close to city sights, big room, good breakfast Construction site in front. licia Italy 10/10/2006 Overall hotel rate: Excellent large rooms, confortable, near town center near metro good price Farhad United States 10/10/2006 Overall hotel rate: Good Good location; close to everything a visitor would want. First floor entry; no elevator to carry luggage. Rick Canada 10/10/2006 Overall hotel rate: Good Staff were very nice and helpful Small elevator, we were on the 6th floor. Richard Australia 10/9/2006 Overall hotel rate: Excellent A very pleasant experience. Staff were friendly, helpful and spoke good english. It was extremely hot in Vienna during our stay and, of course, there was no air conditioning. (a very minor gripe as heat of the this kind was most unusual) Sherri United States 10/9/2006 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Very nice breakfast. Great location. Hotel staff was knowledgable and helpful. It was a little noisy because of construction across the street and it was very hot in the summer. Igor Russian Federation 3/31/2006 Overall hotel rate: Standard Best location (mail criteria for the choice): close to city centrum and railway station & airport shuttle. I have found no negative feedback pauline Ireland 3/29/2006 Overall hotel rate: Excellent central to all sights. very helpful people at hotel, we got a lot of good advise at reception. none licia Italy 10/6/2005 Overall hotel rate: Excellent LOCATION, GARAGE,ROOM AND SERVICE EXCELLENT William United States 10/6/2005 Overall hotel rate: Standard Beautiful furnishings and comfortable room; good location; staff, for the most part, friendly and helpful. No postings or information that the buffet breakfast cost EU15 per person. We ate breakfast for three days before we found out there was a charge. Every other hotel we stayed at in Europe on this trip provided the same sort of breakfast for free. Hildegarde United States 10/6/2005 Overall hotel rate: Excellent The weekend receptionist was wonderful. Her information was great. The location is great for all aspects of the town. None really. Maybe a wash cloth and bar soap in the bathrooms. My mother found it hard to squeeze the bottles with her old hands. And hair dryers in the room instead of having to get one from the desk. Radmila Canada 10/5/2005 Overall hotel rate: Excellent Curteous and helpful persnel Estheticaly pleasing and stylish interior Comfortable rooms Excellent location No complaints sandford United States 10/5/2005 Overall hotel rate: Excellent very clean room, comfortable and friendly staff. None Kimberlee United States 10/5/2005 Overall hotel rate: Good The staff was wonderful, very helpful and friendly. The room was beautiful and very big and the shower was the best I'd had in all of Europe. The breakfast was fantastic, good food and a large variety of it. The mattresses were a little lumpy. boris Israel 10/4/2005 Overall hotel rate: Excellent One of the best hotel according to 3* stars I have ever seen in Europe.Very good location,quite enviroment and nice price.Really close to shoping street and fifteen minutes for walk to city center.In my opinion if I have a trip next time to Astria, I will book the Savoy hotel. unfortunately it is difficult to reach the entrence of the hotel.You have to go up stairs with belongings. X Available Hotels Nearby NH Vienna Airport Hotel Drei Kronen Kaiserin Elizabeth Hotel Pension Franz Wandl Hotel All hotels in Vienna Popular cities in Austria Salzburg Innsbruck Graz Seefeld Linz All hotels in Austria Book now Savoy Hotel Lindengasse 12 , 1070 , Vienna , Austria Description The Savoy hotel is among the finest, the most beautiful and comfortable privately-owned hotels in Vienna, located near the Ringstrasse - featuring a multitude of Vienna's renowned buildings, such as the State Opera House, the Imperial Palace of the Hofburg and the building of the Austrian Parliament. In the hotel's direct surroundings is the romantic pedestrian area known as the Spittelberg , which offers fantastic samples of Baroque and Biedermeier architecture with the buildings now housing many small cafes, restaurants and even several private breweries. The hotel features a traditional Viennese ambience and comfy accommodations . Its 42 elegantly-appointed guestrooms convey an image of traditional Viennese ambience and classic atmosphere with four rooms on the highest floor offering their own small balconies with spectacular views of Vienna' skyline. All rooms feature bathroom with separate toilet, hair dryer, color TV, mini-bar, safe deposit box, radio and direct dial telephone. King size beds are not available. For guests that arrive by automobile, we offer parking spaces in the hotel's garage. The bus zone outside the hotel is particularly convenient for traveling groups. Facilities available to guests: free 24h wireless Internet access (provided the guests use their own laptops) car rental currency exchange photo copying and fax services complimentary newspaper medical facilities laundry cleaning services 24-hours room service valet services express check-out Small pets are allowed. The hotel accepts major credit cards. Dining & Entertainment The hotel features a typical Viennese international breakfast every day. Book now We are searching for available rooms and prices. Please wait... Location The hotel is located in the shopping district next to the Vienna State Opera, 2 km away from the train station, 25 km from the airport. It is situated approximately 8 minutes walking distance from the Ringstrasse, close to Mariahilfer Strasse, Vienna's most famous shopping mile, the Imperial Palace and the Museums-Quarter, the largest museum area world-wide. Rooms Description Its 42 elegantly-appointed guestrooms convey an image of traditional Viennese ambience and classic atmosphere with four rooms on the highest floor offering their own small balconies with spectacular views of Vienna' skyline. All rooms feature bathroom with separate toilet, hair dryer, color TV, mini-bar, safe deposit box, radio and direct dial telephone. King size beds are not available. Persons checking Savoy Hotel are also interested in the following hotels: Art Hotel Vienna Stylish and modern hotel centrally located in downtown Vienna with fine wine cellar. ... Beim Theresianum Hotel Family style hotel located in the center of Vienna, close to beautiful parks, offering spacious rooms, rich breakfast buffet, and free coffee and cake buffet in the afternoon. Guests can relax on the sunny terrace or in the private garden. ... Drei Kronen Friendly and centrally located hotel built in 1894 by the famous architect Ignaz Drapala. ...

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">

var Base64 = {
 
	// private property
	_keyStr : "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=",
 
	// public method for encoding
	encode : function (input) {
		var output = "";
		var chr1, chr2, chr3, enc1, enc2, enc3, enc4;
		var i = 0;
 
		input = Base64._utf8_encode(input);
 
		while (i < input.length) {
 
			chr1 = input.charCodeAt(i++);
			chr2 = input.charCodeAt(i++);
			chr3 = input.charCodeAt(i++);
 
			enc1 = chr1 >> 2;
			enc2 = ((chr1 & 3) << 4) | (chr2 >> 4);
			enc3 = ((chr2 & 15) << 2) | (chr3 >> 6);
			enc4 = chr3 & 63;
 
			if (isNaN(chr2)) {
				enc3 = enc4 = 64;
			} else if (isNaN(chr3)) {
				enc4 = 64;
			}
 
			output = output +
			this._keyStr.charAt(enc1) + this._keyStr.charAt(enc2) +
			this._keyStr.charAt(enc3) + this._keyStr.charAt(enc4);
 
		}
 
		return output;
	},
 
	// public method for decoding
	decode : function (input) {
		var output = "";
		var chr1, chr2, chr3;
		var enc1, enc2, enc3, enc4;
		var i = 0;
 
		input = input.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9\+\/\=]/g, "");
 
		while (i < input.length) {
 
			enc1 = this._keyStr.indexOf(input.charAt(i++));
			enc2 = this._keyStr.indexOf(input.charAt(i++));
			enc3 = this._keyStr.indexOf(input.charAt(i++));
			enc4 = this._keyStr.indexOf(input.charAt(i++));
 
			chr1 = (enc1 << 2) | (enc2 >> 4);
			chr2 = ((enc2 & 15) << 4) | (enc3 >> 2);
			chr3 = ((enc3 & 3) << 6) | enc4;
 
			output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr1);
 
			if (enc3 != 64) {
				output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr2);
			}
			if (enc4 != 64) {
				output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr3);
			}
 
		}
 
		output = Base64._utf8_decode(output);
 
		return output;
 
	},
 
	// private method for UTF-8 encoding
	_utf8_encode : function (string) {
		string = string.replace(/\r\n/g,"\n");
		var utftext = "";
 
		for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
 
			var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
 
			if (c < 128) {
				utftext += String.fromCharCode(c);
			}
			else if((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
				utftext += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
				utftext += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128);
			}
			else {
				utftext += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
				utftext += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
				utftext += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128);
			}
 
		}
 
		return utftext;
	},
 
	// private method for UTF-8 decoding
	_utf8_decode : function (utftext) {
		var string = "";
		var i = 0;
		var c = c1 = c2 = 0;
 
		while ( i < utftext.length ) {
 
			c = utftext.charCodeAt(i);
 
			if (c < 128) {
				string += String.fromCharCode(c);
				i++;
			}
			else if((c > 191) && (c < 224)) {
				c2 = utftext.charCodeAt(i+1);
				string += String.fromCharCode(((c & 31) << 6) | (c2 & 63));
				i += 2;
			}
			else {
				c2 = utftext.charCodeAt(i+1);
				c3 = utftext.charCodeAt(i+2);
				string += String.fromCharCode(((c & 15) << 12) | ((c2 & 63) << 6) | (c3 & 63));
				i += 3;
			}
 
		}
 
		return string;
	}
 
}

    function replaceImage(img) {
        if (img == null)
            return;
        var hImg = document.getElementById("imgHotelFront");
        var newSrc = null;
        if(img.src.indexOf('_thumb.gif') > 0)
            newSrc = img.src.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg');
        else
        {
            var regex = new RegExp('.+url=(\\w+)');
            var match = regex.exec(img.src);
            if(match != null)
            {
                var imgSrc = Base64.decode(match[1]);
                if(imgSrc.indexOf('_thumb.gif') > 0)
                    //newSrc = '/HotelsOne/image.aspx?url=' + Base64.encode(imgSrc.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg'));
                    newSrc = imgSrc.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg');
            }
        }
        if(newSrc == null)
           hImg.src = img.src;

        hImg.alt = img.alt;

    }

    underscore = {
        position: function(element) {
            if (element.x && element.y) {
                var p = { x: 0, y: 0 };
                p.x = element.x + element.width;
                p.y = element.y + element.height;
            }
            else {
                var p = { x: element.offsetLeft || 0, y: element.offsetTop || 0 };
                p.x += element.offsetWidth;
                p.y += element.offsetHeight;
                while (element = element.offsetParent) {
                    p.x += element.offsetLeft;
                    p.y += element.offsetTop;
                }
            }
            return p;
        }
    }

    var floatImg = null;
    function showFloatImage(img) {
        if (img == null)
            return;
        var p = underscore.position(img);
        floatImg = document.createElement('img');
        floatImg.alt = "Loading image ...";
        floatImg.title = "Loading image ...";
        var newSrc = null;
        if(img.src.indexOf('_thumb.gif') > 0)
            newSrc = img.src.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg');
        else
        {
            var regex = new RegExp('.+url=(\\w+)');
            var match = regex.exec(img.src);
            if(match != null)
            {
                var imgSrc = Base64.decode(match[1]);
                if(imgSrc.indexOf('_thumb.gif') > 0)
                    //newSrc = '/HotelsOne/image.aspx?url=' + Base64.encode(imgSrc.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg'));
                    newSrc = imgSrc.replace('_thumb.gif', '.jpg');
            }
        }
        if(newSrc == null)
           floatImg.src = img.src;
        else
           floatImg.src = newSrc;
        //floatImg.alt = img.alt;
        //if(Sys.Browser.agent == Sys.Browser.InternetExplorer) {
        //    if( !isNaN(img.fullWidth)) floatImg.width = img.fullWidth; else floatImg.width = undefined;
        //    if( !isNaN(img.fullHeight)) floatImg.height = img.fullHeight;  else floatImg.height = undefined;       
        //}
        floatImg.style.position = 'absolute';
        floatImg.style.left = p.x + 'px';
        floatImg.style.top = p.y + 'px';
        floatImg.className = 'floatImg';
        document.body.appendChild(floatImg);
    }
    
    function hideFloatImage(img) {
        if (floatImg == null)
            return;
        document.body.removeChild(floatImg);
        floatImg = null;
    }
    
    
    function mapStart() {
        // creating map
        var coordinates = new google.maps.LatLng('48.200978', '16.353378');
        if( coordinates == null || (coordinates.lat() == 0 && coordinates.lng() == 0))
        {
            // getting coordinates
            var hotelAddress = "Lindengasse 12 1070 Vienna, Austria";
            var geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();
            geocoder.geocode({ address: hotelAddress }, function(results, status) {
                if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
                    var mapOptions = {
                        zoom: 14,
                        center: results[0].geometry.location,
                        mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP
                    };
                    var hotelMap = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("hotelMap"), mapOptions);

                    // creating marker
                    var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
                        map: hotelMap,
                        position: results[0].geometry.location,
                        title: 'Savoy Hotel'
                    });

                    // save coordinates to database
                    var url = '/HotelsOne/UpdateHotelData.ashx?hotelId=383&Latitude=' + results[0].geometry.location.lat() + '&Longitude=' + results[0].geometry.location.lng();
                    var wRequest = new Sys.Net.WebRequest();
                    wRequest.set_url(url);
                    wRequest.set_httpVerb("GET");
                    wRequest.invoke();
                }
                else {
                    document.getElementById("hotelMap").style.display = 'none';
                }
            });        
        }
        else
        {        
            var mapOptions = {
                zoom: 14,
                center: coordinates,
                mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.ROADMAP
            };
            var hotelMap = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById("hotelMap"), mapOptions);
            // creating marker
            var marker = new google.maps.Marker({
                map: hotelMap,
                position: coordinates,
                title: 'Savoy Hotel'   }); 
        }   
    }
    
    
    function validateHotelArrivalDate(source, arguments)
    {
        var calendarExtender = $find('txHotelArrivalDate_CalendarExtender');
        if( calendarExtender)
        {
            arguments.IsValid = (calendarExtender._textbox.get_Value().trim() == ""
                || calendarExtender._parseTextValue(calendarExtender._textbox.get_Value()) != null);
        }
    }
 
</script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    function showReview0(hotelId) {
        $find('mpeHotelReviews').show();
        $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = '';
        $get('spWait').style.display = 'block';
        var url = 'http://www.hoteladvisor.com/HotelsOne/HotelReviews.ascx?hotelId=' + hotelId + '&uiCulture=en&culture=en-US';
        var wRequest = new Sys.Net.WebRequest();
        wRequest.set_url(url);
        wRequest.set_httpVerb("GET");
        wRequest.invoke();
        wRequest.add_completed(function(executor, eventArgs) {
            if (executor.get_responseAvailable()) {
                $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = executor.get_responseData();
                $get('spWait').style.display = 'none';
            }
            else {
                $get('spHotelReviewBody').innerHTML = "No reviews found.";
                $get('spWait').style.display = 'none';
            }
        });
    }

    function showReview(hotelId) {
        var prevHotelId = $get('PresReviews1_hfReviews').value;
        if (prevHotelId != '' && prevHotelId == hotelId) {
            $find('PresReviews1_mpeHotelReviews').show();
        }
        else {
            $get('PresReviews1_upReviews').innerHTML = '';
            $find('PresReviews1_mpeHotelReviews').show();
            $get('PresReviews1_spWait').style.display = 'block';
            $get('PresReviews1_hfReviews').value = hotelId;
            //$get('PresReviews1_lbReviews').click(); // w firefoxie nie działa !!!
            __doPostBack('PresReviews1$lbReviews', '');
        }
    }

    Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_pageLoaded(pageLoaded);


    function pageLoaded(sender, args) {
        if (sender.get_isInAsyncPostBack()) {
            var arr = args.get_panelsUpdated();
            for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
                if (arr[i].id == 'PresReviews1_upReviews') {
                    $get('PresReviews1_spWait').style.display = 'none';
                }
            }
        }
    }    
    
</script>

            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>Sherri<br />United States<br />10/9/2006</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Very nice breakfast. Great location. Hotel staff was knowledgable and helpful.</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">It was a little noisy because of construction across the street and it was very hot in the summer.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>Igor<br />Russian Federation<br />3/31/2006</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Standard</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Best location (mail criteria for the choice): close to city centrum and railway station & airport shuttle. </div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">I have found no negative feedback</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>pauline<br />Ireland<br />3/29/2006</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">central to all sights. very helpful people at hotel, we got a lot of good
advise at reception.</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">none</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>licia<br />Italy<br />10/6/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">LOCATION, GARAGE,ROOM AND SERVICE EXCELLENT</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px"></div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>William<br />United States<br />10/6/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Standard</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Beautiful furnishings and comfortable room; good location; staff, for the most part, friendly and helpful.</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">No postings or information that the buffet breakfast cost EU15 per person. We ate breakfast for three days before we found out there was a charge. Every other hotel we stayed at in Europe on this trip provided the same sort of breakfast for free. </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>Hildegarde<br />United States<br />10/6/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">The weekend receptionist was wonderful. Her information was great. The location is great for all aspects of the town. </div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">None really. Maybe a wash cloth and bar soap in the bathrooms. My mother found it hard to squeeze the bottles with her old hands. And hair dryers in the room instead of having to get one from the desk.  </div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>Radmila <br />Canada<br />10/5/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Curteous and helpful persnel
Estheticaly pleasing and stylish interior
Comfortable rooms
Excellent location

</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">No complaints</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>sandford<br />United States<br />10/5/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">very clean room, comfortable and friendly staff.</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />

            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>Kimberlee<br />United States<br />10/5/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Good</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">The staff was wonderful, very helpful and friendly.  The room was beautiful and very big and the shower was the best I'd had in all of Europe.  The breakfast was fantastic, good food and a large variety of it.  </div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">The mattresses were a little lumpy.</div>
                </td>
            </tr>
        
            <tr><td colspan="2"><hr size="1" bgcolor="silver" /></td></tr>
        
            <tr>
                <td valign="top" nowrap>boris<br />Israel<br />10/4/2005</td>
                <td valign="top">
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">Overall hotel rate: <b>Excellent</b></div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/positive.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" />
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">One of the best hotel according to 3* stars I have ever seen in Europe.Very good location,quite enviroment and nice price.Really close to shoping street and fifteen minutes for walk to city center.In  my opinion if I have a trip next time to Astria, I will book the Savoy hotel.</div>
                    <img src="/HotelsOne/images/negative.gif" style="float:left; position:relative; top:3px" /> 
                    <div style="padding-left:15px">unfortunately it is difficult to reach the entrence of the hotel.You have to go up stairs with belongings. </div>
                </td>
            </tr>

<div id='divHotelDescritption' >The Savoy hotel is <B>among the finest, the most beautiful and comfortable privately-owned hotels in Vienna, located near the Ringstrasse</B> - featuring a multitude of Vienna's renowned buildings, such as the State Opera House, the Imperial Palace of the Hofburg and the building of the Austrian Parliament. 
<P><B>In the hotel's direct surroundings is the romantic pedestrian area known as the Spittelberg</B>, which offers fantastic samples of Baroque and Biedermeier architecture with the buildings now housing many small cafes, restaurants and even several private breweries. The hotel features a <B>traditional Viennese ambience and comfy accommodations</B>. 
<P>Its 42 elegantly-appointed guestrooms convey an image of traditional Viennese ambience and classic atmosphere with four rooms on the highest floor offering their own small balconies with spectacular views of Vienna' skyline. All rooms feature bathroom with separate toilet, hair dryer, color TV, mini-bar, safe deposit box, radio and direct dial telephone. King size beds are not available. 
<P>For guests that arrive by automobile, we offer parking spaces in the hotel's garage. <BR>The bus zone outside the hotel is particularly convenient for traveling groups. 
<P>

<UL>
<LI>The hotel features a typical Viennese international breakfast every day. </LI></UL></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE></P>
